page.title: 16THE PARISH PRIEST AT WORK
page.content: Father Michael is a priest at St.Paul's Church,Marton.Some of his duties are taking communion services,marrying people and taking funerals.He also goes about the parish talking to the parishioners. He visits Baines'Endowed School every Friday to talk to the pupils. Once he told us about the time when an old lady phoned him up and asked him if he would go round to her house because it was haunted.He went to the old lady's house and soon calmed her down.He found out why her electric light was flickering,why her T.V.was going on and off and why there was a howling noise at the door. He has been a priest at St.Paul's for almost a year now and is serving the community well.On Sundays he holds services at 10a.m. and 11.30 a.m.and gives communion to confirmed people.
